short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Filter Amazon search results dynamically using OpenAI.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance your Amazon shopping experience with Amazon AI Shopper! This innovative Chrome extension uses the power of AI to help you find the most relevant products effortlessly.

Key Features:

Smart Filtering: Apply AI-driven filters to narrow down search results based on your personalized criteria.
Easy Configuration: Seamlessly configure your OpenAI API key and enable/disable the extension with a simple toggle.
Streamlined UI: Intuitive and responsive interface for adding and managing filters on the go.
Effortless Search Optimization: Hide irrelevant items and focus only on the products that matter to you.
Perfect for discerning shoppers, professionals, and anyone who wants to save time and make smarter purchasing decisions. Unlock the future of shopping with Amazon AI Shopper today!
